#include<bits/stdc++.h>
#define ll long long
#define pb push_back
#define mp make_pair
#define NL printf("\n")
#define mem(a,b) memset(a, b, sizeof(a))
#define ft first
#define sd second
using namespace std;
const ll mod = 1000000007;
typedef pair<int,int> pii;
ll power(ll a, ll b){
    if(b==0){
        return 1;
    }
    ll tmp=power(a, b/2);
    tmp=(tmp%mod) * (tmp%mod);
    if(b&1){
        tmp = a*(tmp%mod);
    }
    return tmp%mod;
}
int main(){
    //printf("Hello World..!\n");
    int t;
    cin>>t;
    while(t--){
        ll c, k;
        cin>>c>>k;
        ll x=1, y=0;
        while(x<=c){
            y++;
            x *= 2;
        }
        //ll x = (double)log2(c);
        ll ans = power(y-1 ,k);
        cout<<ans<<endl;
    }
    return 0;
}
